message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Hey Alice, $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $100 right now. What do you think?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I have to make a living too. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $140 for it.
Alice, $140 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to go up to $120, but that's my absolute limit. Let me know if that works for you.
I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I need to get as close to my minimum price as possible. I'm willing to compromise at $130
